## Input.removeField() method

Remove a field from this input.

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeField(name: string, opt_quiet?: boolean): boolean;
```

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

string

The name of the field.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

opt\_quiet


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ True to prevent an error if field is not present.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

True if operation succeeds, false if field is not present and opt\_quiet is true.

{<!-- -->Error<!-- -->} if the field is not present and opt\_quiet is false.
